cause.description:
Wrestlers, unite!
July 15, 2007 marks one year since the world lost an icon.
Let's keep him alive & party it up BP style!!
1. BP is God.
2. BP will be forever loved & missed.
3. BP will rise again!
cause.mission: honor the life & achievements of Charles.
cause.name: In Memory of Charles "Black Plague" Armstrong (1983 - 2006)
